website_summaries.verdict: These well detailed cat charms are the perfect gift for the wine-drinking cat lover in your family.
pros: Set comes with six different colored cat charms
Charms are soft and gentle on glass
Goes on easy and stays in place while you drink
Cat charms can fit varying sizes of wine glass stems
Cat face and paws are clear and detailed
cons: At a quick glance, the black and grey cats are too similar

customer_reviews.title: My mom's friends started calling dibs on the colors!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my mom opened this for her birthday, her friends started calling dibs on colors! "I want the orange one!" "Nope, it's MY gift from MY daughter, I get the orange one!" They are very flexible but hold their shape well, they came right on time, and they made a great gift that no one was expecting! If you've ever heard your family members or friends say, "Now which wine glass is mine?" before, then this gift is a great way to remedy that problem! Would definintely recommend, and may even buy another set for another family member!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Pillsbury

customer_reviews.title: YEP! THAT'S MY WINE GLASS!
customer_reviews.text: How many times have you been at an event or gathering and wondered, is that my wine glass? Well fret no more! These cute little drink markers take away the guessing element, especially as the night goes on and you've had a few. We've all been there and while some may say, they're totally unnecessary, I can attest that they certainly come in handy! So if you're someone who entertains, or has a gathering every once in a while, even expect family and friends over for the holidays, these markers add a great touch of eliminating waste & identifying yours from the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Peepchick

customer_reviews.title: Multi Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I used these as little tabletop Christmas tree ornaments. They were perfectly sized and looked very nice. They do fit my wine glass stems and would be a practical solution as markers. Would be a nice addition to a hostess gift. Looked better on my tree.
customer_reviews.author: LillyMax

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from these. They don't stay on evey the narrowest stemmed glass.
customer_reviews.text: These don't work. They fall off. They don't wrap around even the smallest wine glass stem, I'd give them zero stars if that were possible.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bethune

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combination of whimsy and practicality.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a Christmas gift for my mom, but I want to keep them for myself. These wine markers are adorable and fit on a variety of glass stems. They feel like good quality, and the detail on the faces and paws is spot on. There are other similar items out there, but these looked like they had the highest attention to detail and quality. Perfect gift for cat-lovers and wine-drinkers alike.
customer_reviews.author: Steph J

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Got these for my mom and she loves them. Wish there were a wider variety of colors. Sometimes (when you're drinking wine) it's easy to mix them up because they're all sort of neutral colored. Still cute, and I might buy some for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy these are. We have a lot of stemless glassware and these fit on the rims and don’t seem to slide around much!
customer_reviews.author: Grace L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift, but packaging came in damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, was delivered to me with a bash in the front. Had to repackage to be able to gift it. Which is a shame because the packing it comes w is cute.
customer_reviews.author: big bitchin

customer_reviews.title: Too dang cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are just too dang cute! And much easier to put on that some other wine charms I have used. (The dark brown one sort of looks like a turd - which made them that much more fun for my sick-and-twisted friends!) I'm going to get another set for my nephew - who loves Dachshunds.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: These cute curled up kitty wine glass markers are functional and adorable! They would also make a great gift for any cat lover on your list.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and kitschy!

customer_reviews.text: Adorable little novelty drink markers.....a bit pricey for sure, but every once in a while why not treat yourself. Only concern is making sure our kids don't try and steal them for playing around with. :) Have washed them once, and they still seem fine, so should last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: I think these are super cute, but I do think they are a bit pricey.

customer_reviews.title: Included these in a gift basket for a friend and she loved them. She tells me she frequently gets compliments ...

customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my daughter for Christmas after a friend showed me her set. Dear daughter loves them, and has plans to buy them for friends. So clever and cute, and not tinkly sounding like metal charms. Cat lovers will especially get a kick out of these.

customer_reviews.text: It was a HIT! Arrived as a last minute Christmas gift, just in time for the BIG Day! Flexible and sturdy, and since the owners have several cats, everyone thought it was very clever. Thank you to Fred and Friends for selling this product!

customer_reviews.title: Unique and easy to attach wine glass ID's
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute looking and are so much easier to attach to wine glasses than the usual wire kind. Plus, easier to see than trying to look at some small ornament on a piece of wire around a glass stem.

customer_reviews.title: These are cute. However, unless you have wine ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. However, unless you have wine glasses with the incredibly thing stems, these won't stay on. These eventually pop off of even the thinnest stemmed glasses I own.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality BUT don't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Update: (3 star loss) We came to notice that these fit pretty much none of our glasses. Our stems are just normal, and we have many brands, and different style of wine glasses... but apparently the stems are too thick for these. They basically just pop off when you grab the glass or move it. Pretty dissapointing if you ask me. Super nice quality, cute, but don't stay on the glass. So unless you have a really thin stem i would avoid these particular ones... Awesome gift for my wife! She loves these things. We have cat ones, walrus, now these. We have a lot of parties so these are a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: mitsuevors

customer_reviews.title: A little sharpie and white nail polish for the black kitty allowed me to vary the markings on the second set so company can easi
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets by accident. A little sharpie and white nail polish for the black kitty allowed me to vary the markings on the second set so company can easily identify their glasses. These are the easiest to simply rest on the stem. I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Susan Goodis

customer_reviews.title: These don't fit on stemmed water glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These little Koala glass markers are cute, but only fit glasses with very slim stems. I bought them to work on some stemmed water glasses, but the stems of the glasses are larger than the arms of the koalas. THEY DONT WORK ON STEMMED WATER GLASSES OR GLASSES WITH LARGER STEMS!! Just on slim stemmed wine glasses. If I had known I would not have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: L. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Cute, stay ON until you take them off, AND they make awesome gifts!
customer_reviews.text: These rubber cat markers (for stemmed drinks or possibly for handled cups) are CUTE and easy to take on and off. No, they don't fall off like other markers, they come off only when you take them off! Nice change from the wires that take nimble fingers or the suction ones that never stay on. SO CUTE and lots of compliments ... so now I buy them as great gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: NM Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! They're going to be a gift but we were tempted to get another set for ourselves just based on cuteness! I like these better than all the little charms out there (several we've been given) - they all seem cheap and are too easy to leave on the glasses. These are neither cheap nor easy to ignore. Puuurfect!
customer_reviews.author: CCinNC

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids bowls and plates!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these for my grandkids cereal bowls and plates. They love having little critters join them for meals and snacks!

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! The grey and light blue are a little difficult to tell apart, but our host didn't seem to mind.

product_meta.title: Fred WINE LIVES Kitty Drink Markers, Set of 6
product_meta.description: Color:KittyCUDDLY CATS CLAIM YOUR WINE. Purrfect kitty wine markers wrap around the stem of your glass and remind you which glass is yours. You get six color-coded silicone Wine Lives in each set. Fred's WINE LIVES drink markers are made of soft, food safe, BPA-free silicone. The flexible silicone design makes it a perfect fit for most stemmed drinkware including wine glasses, champagne flutes, martini glasses, and more! WINE LIVES cat drink markers are packed in a colorful box perfect and ready for gifting! Ideal for hostess gifts, housewarmings, newlyweds, white elephant parties, cat lovers, and so much more!
feature_bullets: FUN & FUNCTIONAL: These cuddly cats are here to claim your wine! The cute kitties wrap around the stem of your glass so you never have to guess which one is yours!
A CROWD PLEASER: Dress up cocktail hour by using these playful cat drink charms! Their colorful, charming deisgn is sure to make you and your guests smile every time! A must have for any cat lover!
SET OF 6: This set of cute cat wine charms come in a set of six, each in a different, fun color.

QUALITY MATERIALS: Fred's WINE LIVES drink markers are made of soft, food safe, BPA-free silicone. The flexible silicone design makes it a perfect fit for most stemmed drinkware including wine glasses, champagne flutes, martini glasses, and more!

GREAT GIFT: WINE LIVES cat drink markers are packed in a colorful box perfect and ready for gifting! Ideal for hostess gifts, housewarmings, newlyweds, white elephant parties, cat lovers, and so much more!
